img_above_text:
![Wukong Martial 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c8/Wukong_Martial_6.jpg)
He can also send his chakram spinning along the ground to slice past you. Sometimes he'll just use it to "walk the dog" as it slides at you and then back to him, but that's not all. While you're distracted, he can also follow up with a spinning kick before getting his weapon back.
img_below_text:
After closing the distance, he can employ a variety of slashing combos with his chakram, like performing a leaping two-hit spin, and then after a short delay following up with a third spinning slice.
This boss is also fond of teleporting to distract you as well, rapidly appearing behind or to the side of you before throwing his chakram at you to keep you guessing.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Martial 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c8/Wukong_Martial_6.jpg)
He can also send his chakram spinning along the ground to slice past you. Sometimes he'll just use it to "walk the dog" as it slides at you and then back to him, but that's not all. While you're distracted, he can also follow up with a spinning kick before getting his weapon back."
        - Following Text: "After closing the distance, he can employ a variety of slashing combos with his chakram, like performing a leaping two-hit spin, and then after a short delay following up with a third spinning slice.
This boss is also fond of teleporting to distract you as well, rapidly appearing behind or to the side of you before throwing his chakram at you to keep you guessing."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against the "Green-Capped Martialist." The boss is shown mid-attack, wielding a chakram surrounded by fiery effects. The preceding and following text describe the boss's combat style, emphasizing its ability to use the chakram for spinning ground attacks, slashing combos, and teleportation to disorient the player. The image visually complements the guide's explanation of the boss's dynamic and unpredictable moves.
